Name: Tree Simulator 2021
About the game: Back by poplar demand and against all odds, be a tree with no responsibilities other than to exist. Wood you like marginally improved graphics? Do you like leafing it all behind and taking root in some random field? If so, you are a tree, be the best tree you can be. Prepare for a deeper and more detailed understanding of what it is to be a tree. A true work of art. Now with weather! Controls: A D: Rotate view Escape: Menu / Settings
